content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 22}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 40, "index": 34}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a cyan dye, I first need to craft a green dye. Green dye can be crafted from cactus, which is located at slot 39. Therefore I will smelt the cactus to get the green dye.
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 22}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 40, "index": 34}]

thought: Now that I have the green dye, I need to move it to the crafting grid so that I can combine it with the blue dye. The blue dye is located at slot 23, so I will move the green dye to slot 1 so that it is to the left of the blue dye.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 22}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 40, "index": 34}]
thought: Now that the green dye is in the crafting grid, I need to move the blue dye to the right of it. The blue dye is located at slot 23, so I will move it to slot 2.
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 22}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 40, "index": 34}]

thought: Now that I have the cyan dye, I need to move it to the crafting grid so that I can combine it with the blue dye. The blue dye is located at slot 23, so I will move the cyan dye to slot 1 so that it is to the left of the blue dye.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
